On the final day of the course, we had a session about the R package ggplot2, which is widely used for making graphs as there are a lot of options to personalize. After learning some theory behind it, the structure and some examples, we did some exercises ourselves by following a tutorial from NBIS. With this, we had a more basic exercise, and two more complex ones where we tried to recreate some public plots.
